turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Okay, I can help with that! To give you the best recommendations, could you tell me how many people you're cooking for and roughly how many meals you need to cover? Also, do you have any dietary restrictions or preferences, such as vegetarian, gluten-free, etc.?

turns.speaker: user

turns.speaker: agent
